page.title: 02FARMING-PATCHWAY/LITTLESTOKE
page.content: Half the block is farmed - 3/4 of this is grass,the rest is used for crops eg wheat,barleyand oats. There are{7 active farms}- Bailey's Court (115ha),Grange (83ha),Leyland Court (73ha),Manor (72ha),Knightwood (48ha),Mulgrove (23ha) and Greenacres (19ha). Most farms concentrate on animal rearing,beef is most important then sheep fattening,dairying and some pig rearing Farm land was lost by the building of the M4.Other land has been sold for house building,a school,the motorcycle centre and the windsurfing lake. Farmers nearer the housing complained of gates being left open and of stealing becoming a problem. In the near future farms to the west of the M4 expect to lose their land to the major housing development plans..
